ratings.comment: His record of attendance was terrible as he gave one of the female students a “free” late for over ten minutes for no reason. He also does not clearly grade your assignments as not rubric is submitted on canvas for you to check. The humiliation of student is also a problem. Calling students “dummy” and “stupid” should not be acceptable.

He is fierce at the beginning but gradually becomes friendly, perhaps he wants students to follow his rules. Each homework will be given a guide before grading. However, ESL course has too many assignments, but this is the matter of the course.
His lectures are interesting. He also gives some course time to do assignments. He gives some examples to homework, so just need to follow and modify on them

One of the best professors I had, his class was a lot of work but he gave clear feedback and the work was not too hard. He was really caring, changed deadlines if needed and gave extra opportunities for those making effort. He might have been a little scary sometimes but it was mainly him playing jokes. Participate in his class and he will like you

Terry is the best English teacher that I had. I was scared of him during my first lecture, but then I understood that he is a very kind and supportive person. What I liked most about him is that he genuinely cares about his students and always wants to help. Definitely recommend taking 118 with him, because he makes the course fun and not so hard.

Terry is literally the best English teacher I've ever had. Personally, I think ESL 118 is not that painful with him. Sometimes he can be really intimidating, but most of the time he is just joking around. However, once you get to know his personality, he is really nice and sweet!
The best English teacher Ive ever had!

I was so intimidated and scared of him at first, but eventually you'll get to know that he's very caring toward his students. Just do all his work and you'll do fine in his class. You definitely don't want to upset him in class! xD

Terry is a very respectable English teacher with vast knowledge. He also cares a lot about his students and gives A LOT of feedback and advice for those who are struggling. He's a cool guy when you get to know him.
He seems a tough grader for the very first time, but actually he's caring and nice when grading papers. Workload is not that many compared to other ESL 118 instructors.

He is fine in teaching. He explained his idea really well and he respected your idea. Easy to get angry. When you were meeting with him, he might get angry for very little reason. He is always nice to girls, and he is more demanding to guys. He graded your paper pretty harsh, but you might get an A or AB at last. He is fine. You can take his 118.
Terry made the class very enjoyable and improved my writing greatly. He might seem intimidating but is actually very approachable.

ESL118 is a 3 credit course that feels like it should be worth 10. However, Terry made the experience as pleasant as it could be. He was intimidating at the start of the semester but by the third week, you'll warm up to him. He was funny, charming, and super helpful with every student. I really felt like he cared about his students a lot. LOVE HIM!

Terry is an amazing instructor and I was very lucky to have him for ESL 118. He seems really scary at the start of the semester, but that soon fades away as the semester goes by. While he does care a lot about the essay format more than other instructors, I found that if you follow his instructions, you can get an A easily. Terry, thanks a lot.

it is ridiculous to say he is fair because he always gets as many points off as he can if you did something he doesn't like but totally OK for APA style. He just accepts the style he prefers and makes you use it no matter how unreasonable it is. You cannot argue with him but if you do ,you only get more points off and is called"stupid","dumb"

Terry is definitely the best ESL instructor !!! You may be feel uncomfortable at the begining of the semster, but you will soon find that he is actaully a really nice person. The grade is fair. Three papers, each 4-10 pages.
He is one of those who have bad attitude and always make you feel that u are the stupidest student in the world. No respect to his students.
I just can't understand why he intended to make your grade below A. Because you can't reply to his ridiculous jokes, you can't get an A.

Terry seems very terrifying at the beginning of the semester, but he really wants to help you and encourages you to make progresses in writing academic essays. Very helpful. One of the best teachers I have ever encountered.
Terry come of as a hard grader who is always mad at the begninning of the semester. But he gets better and he is really helpful and tries to make your life easier
